UniprotID	Q9H081

EntryName	MIS12_HUMAN
ProteinName	Protein MIS12 homolog
GeneName	MIS12
Length	205
Function	Part of the MIS12 complex which is required for normal chromosome alignment and segregation and for kinetochore formation during mitosis (PubMed:12515822, PubMed:15502821, PubMed:16585270). Essential for proper kinetochore microtubule attachments (PubMed:23891108).
Subcellular Location	Chromosome; Centromere; Kinetochore
